title: Firefox won’t start properly: suck in “Restore session”
content:
Hi, I'm having an issue with Firefox on Windows 10 Pro. Every time I open the browser, I get the "Restore Session / Restore Tabs" screen, but when I click to restore, nothing loads, normal window. Firefox goes into a loop, showing the same screen again, and it won't let me browse, search, or open a Details: 

• Operating system: Windows 10 Pro • Firefox version: latest version (updated today) • No extensions installed • I don't need to recover my previous tabs, | just want Firefox to start normally again.

Any help to solve this issue or force Firefox to start without restoring the session would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

title: Best Painting Services in Dubai
content:
Best Painting Services in Dubai: A Practical Guide to Choosing the Right Partner for Your Space

Finding a reliable painting team in Dubai can feel overwhelming, especially when every company claims to be the best. What property owners truly need is a service provider who delivers clean work, consistent quality, and long-term results without disruptions. This is where Reef Deco has become a preferred choice for many residents and businesses seeking the best painting services in Dubai.

This guide explains what to look for when hiring painters, what makes a service credible, and how Reef Deco supports both residential and commercial spaces across the UAE.

Why Choosing the Best Painting Services in Dubai Matters Painting might look simple from the outside, but the final outcome depends on preparation, material selection, and execution. Dubai’s climate adds extra challenges. The right team helps you avoid peeling, fading, patchiness, and yearly repainting.

Key reasons to hire professionals Consistent finish quality Professionals follow step-by-step preparation, ensuring walls are even, clean, and ready to absorb paint properly.

Correct material usage Dubai’s heat and humidity demand paints designed to withstand temperature changes. Using the right type increases durability.

Time efficiency Skilled painters complete projects within planned timelines so your schedule remains uninterrupted.

Cleaner execution With the right tools and protective setup, your floors, furniture, and fixtures stay safe during the process.

Commercial Painting UAE: What Businesses Need to Know A commercial space is not just an area for work. It reflects brand identity and influences customer perception. When companies search for Commercial Painting UAE, they often look for reliability, quiet operations, and clean finishing.

Reef Deco assists businesses such as offices, retail stores, restaurants, warehouses, and hospitality facilities by offering solutions suited for heavy daily usage.

What businesses value most Fast completion without interruptions

Painting teams coordinate schedules so ongoing operations are minimally affected.

Durable coatings for high-traffic zones Commercial environments require paints that resist scratches, stains, and repeated cleaning.

Neat workmanship Edges, corners, trims, and surfaces receive careful attention for a polished appearance.

How Reef Deco Approaches Every Project Clients often appreciate that Reef Deco follows a methodical process that avoids shortcuts. This ensures that the final finish remains smooth and consistent over time.

Process highlights Detailed site assessment Wall preparation, including filling, sanding, and priming Guidance on color combinations and finishes Application with professional tools Final inspection to confirm quality


This structured approach is one of the reasons Reef Deco is frequently chosen by people searching for the best painting services in Dubai.

Helping Clients Select the Right Paint Different areas require different paint types. Reef Deco assists clients in understanding what works best.

Matte finish for living rooms and bedrooms

Semi-gloss for kitchens and doors

Washable paints for children’s rooms

Moisture-resistant paints for bathrooms

Low-odor, low-VOC options for sensitive environments

By choosing the correct type early, repainting needs are reduced and walls stay cleaner for longer.

Why Many Property Owners Prefer Reef Deco Clients appreciate:

Clear communication Clean worksite handling Professional crew Long-lasting finish quality No hidden charges Consistent delivery for both residential and commercial projects These qualities make Reef Deco a trusted option when searching online for both the best painting services in Dubai and Commercial Painting UAE.

Choosing a painting team is less about colors and more about confidence in the people handling your space. Reef Deco focuses on simple, steady workmanship backed by clarity, neat handling, and materials that genuinely suit Dubai’s conditions.

And sure enough those settings are still set to True so why is Outlook now telling me it can't access my clipboard again?

title: Subtitles are not displayed
content:
Hello.

English is not my native language, so I watch all TV series and cartoons in English with subtitles in my native language. Everything was fine until, at some point, one of the most accessible players that provided subtitles stopped displaying them. I thought that the player had broken or that some technical work was being done. But after a week, nothing had changed.

Then I downloaded Chrome, and the subtitles display perfectly in it.

It is in Firefox, specifically this player, that subtitles are not displayed. Other players display subtitles, but they are either unstable or constantly crash. Therefore, they are inconvenient to use and spoil my user experience.

In general, if you have any tips, I would be grateful.
